description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Stay The Night是享有“上尉诗人”美誉的英国创作歌手James Blunt
最新推出的单曲，这首歌收录到他的第三张个人专辑Some Kind of Trouble中。
英国的诗人 James Blunt 在5年前仅仅用了一张处男专辑，或者说是一首美丽的单曲将自己推向了世界。这次带他个人的第三张正是录音专辑《Some Kind of Trouble》花了3年的时间在磨合，而James Blunt也表示这段时间让他本人也感悟许多，对音乐的感悟，以及对生活的感悟。剪短了头发，剃掉了原来那标志性的串脸胡子。

万众期待,James Blunt以全新音乐风格及阳光型男形象强势大回归，全新单曲Stay The Night 于2011年9月10号在奥地利全球首发，单曲一经发布便在奥地利取得了No.4的佳绩，9月12号James Blunt在HFHC(Help for Heroes Charity Concert )现场首次演唱了全新单曲。
感染力十足的首支主打单曲「Stay The Night」，此曲是一首以空心吉他为基底的性感作品，讲述一群朋友一同唱着Michael Jackson的「Billie Jean」，喝着加入咖啡因的伏特加，享受着人生最真诚的幸福时刻。值得一提的是，这首歌曲还引用了雷鬼教父Bob Marley经典名曲「Is This Love」来向前辈致敬。

It's 72 degrees, zero chance of rain
气温华氏72度，感觉不会下雨
It's been a perfect day
如此完美的一天
We're all spinning on our heels
我们开着车自在地兜风
so far away from real
In California
一起远离加州的现实压力
We watched the sunset from our car, we all took it in
坐在我们共乘的车中，一同欣赏着夕阳
And by the time that it was dark, you and me had something, yeah!
当夜幕低垂时分来临，感觉有种悸动在我们之间流转蔓延
And if this is what we've got, then what we've got is gold
如果这就是我们所共同拥有的，那我们所拥有的是黄金般珍贵的事物
We're shining bright and I want you, I want you to know
我们互相辉映着耀眼的光芒，我就是要你。 我要你知道
The morning's on it's way, our friends all say goodbye
清晨即将到来，朋友们一一道别
There's nowhere else to go, I hope that you'll stay the night
没有地方可去了，我希望你可以留下来
Wooo, you'll stay the night
哦~留下和我一起度过这美好的夜晚
Wooo,yeah
哦~耶
We've been singing Billie Jean
我们一起唱着迈克的比利珍
Mixin' vodka with caffeine
伏特加的酒精混搭着咖啡因
We've got strangers stopping by
不时有陌生人停留在我们身旁
And though you're out of tune
即使你唱得荒腔走调
Girl you blow my mind, you do
但女孩你让我疯狂，彻底疯狂
And I'll say I don't wanna say good night
今夜并不想说晚安
There's no quiet corner to get to know each other
找不到安静的角落来让我们认识彼此
And there's no hurry I'm a patient man
慢慢来，我是一个非常有耐心的男人
Is your discover
而你将会发现这一点
Cause if this is what we've got, then what we've got is gold
因为如果这就是我们所共同拥有的，那我们所拥有的是犹如黄金般珍贵的事物
We're shining bright and I want you, I want you to know
我们互相辉映着光芒，我就是要你。我要你知道
The morning's on it's way, our friends all say goodbye 　清晨即将到来，朋友们一一道别
There's nowhere else to go, I hope that you'll stay the night
没有地方好去了， 我希望你留下来
Wooo, you'll stay the night
喔~留下和我一起度过这美好的夜晚
Wooo,yeah
喔~耶
Just like the song on our radio set
就好比之声里传来的音乐一样
We'll share the shelter of my single bed
我们将一同分享我的单人床的庇护
But it's a different tune that's stuck in my head
然而脑海里传来的却是不同的旋律
And it goes…
它不断唱着
If this is what we've got, then what we've got is gold
如果这就是我们所共同拥有的 那我们所拥有的是犹如黄金般珍贵的事物
We're shining bright and I want you, I want you to know
我们互相辉映着光芒，我就是要你。我就是要你知道
The morning's on it's way, our friends all say goodbye
清晨即将到来，朋友们一一道别
There's nowhere else to go, I hope that you'll stay the night
没有地方好去了，希望你留下来和我一起共度这美好的夜晚
If this is what we've got, then what we've got is gold
如果这就是我们所共同拥有的，那我们所拥有的是犹如黄金般珍贵的事物
We're shining bright and I want you, I want you to know
我们互相辉映着光芒，我就是要你。我就是要你知道
The morning's on it's way, our friends all say goodbye
清晨即将到来，朋友们一一道别
There's nowhere else to go, I hope that you'll stay the night
没有地方好去了，希望你留下来和我一起共度这美好的夜晚

title: 国际协议限制非法捕捞(5/5)

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

       

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Insert
To insert means to put something into something else. What is being inserted? How is it inserted? Where is it inserted into?
This week's topic: They inserted the object... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) insert coins into the vending machine
2) insert a credit card into the reader
3) insert a key into the keyhole
4) insert a paragraph into an essay
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

After locking his office door, Shawn returned to the bookcase. Carefully removing a few books in the front, he reached his hand towards the back of the shelf and retrieved a hidden camera. He switched out the memory card and replaced the hidden camera. He put in extra effort in making the arrangement look exactly like it did before. Shawn felt tense when he inserted the memory card into the computer, and got ready to view its content. As Shawn waited for the files to be loaded, he could feel his heart rate increasing.

title: 英文天天写：Insert

description:
Around the world, we're all on average living longer. Great news you may say. But as the old adage goes, "Ageing is the only option to living a long life." And a population of old people is expansive. They require more care. So who pays for that? It's an issue few countries are addressing head-on. Many are too busy cutting back on spending. In a moment, we'll hear why even developing countries with big young populations are worried. But first the World Health Organization says that soon the world will have more older people than children, and more people of very old age than ever before. By the year 2050, nearly 2 billion people on the planet will be aged 60 or more. Some 400 million will be 80 or over. And when it comes to ageing populations, Japan, as the Economist magazine puts it, is the wizened canary in the world's coal mine. It's become older faster than any other big industrialised country. The BBC's Mariko Oi reports.

Shall we go home? Asks 29-year-old Midori Ide. She's come to pick up her grandmother from a nursing home. Her grandma replies with a big smile. At the age of 96, every step from the car to the house requires assistance.
